channel.title: Need help with my new client
channel.description: i used cheezscape source with a custom client and ill turn my server on which is 0.0.0.0 and it will log me into my server how do i change that 0.0.0.0 and also how do i turn my server online because even though im on my server it says its offline

item.title: Need help with my new client
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

You probably did not port forward your router to your computer for that specific port. but as for the ip, that would be in one of the 3 files.

GUI.java
EGUI.java
client.java

Read full topic
item.source: Need help with my new client
